references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation model (latent diffusion models) for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces the CLIP model used to evaluate the proposed method's performance.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces one of the adaptor methods (Textual Inversion) compared in this work.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine-tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper introduces another adaptor method (DreamBooth) compared in this work.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces another adaptor method (LoRA) compared in this work.
